snippet: Mired in bankruptcy, Budget Travel has found ways to generate revenue through digital subscriptions on iPad, Kindle, Nook and Android devices, and from display advertising on its website.
abstract: Budget Travel magazine, mired in bankruptcy, has found ways to generate revenue through digital subscriptions on iPad, Kindle, Nook and Android devices, and from display advertising on its website.
lead_paragraph: Mired in bankruptcy, Budget Travel has found ways to generate revenue through digital subscriptions on iPad, Kindle, Nook and Android devices, and from display advertising on its website.

headline.main: Budget Travel Magazine Sees a Digital Rebirth
headline.print_headline: Budget Travel Magazine Sees a Digital Rebirth
